<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dominion Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=3943) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 33

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The DC of the Dominion Aura feat is the higher of your class DC or spell DC._

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Faultspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3937)

</column>

---

For a short time, you fully manifest the expectations of the god destroyer within you. All creatures within a 10-foot emanation take 8d6 force damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. A creature that fails this save is also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). For 1 minute, any creature who ends its turn within the 10-foot emanation takes 5d6 force damage with a basic Fortitude save. If you aren't [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), you can choose to become drained 2 when you use Dominion Aura to increase the radius of the emanation from 10 feet to 20 feet.
name: Dominion Aura
